ShortDescription.LocalizedString: Modern collaboration footer with hybrid OneDrive and SharePoint storage

LongDescription.LocalizedString: A high-performance SharePoint Framework application customizer that provides a modern, flexible footer with enterprise-grade optimizations. Features hybrid architecture with OneDrive JSON storage for personal links and SharePoint Lists for global links with mandatory/optional flags. Version 8.0 includes lazy loading, enhanced error boundaries, optimized TypeScript implementation, and comprehensive performance improvements.
